kickstart.pre:
if [ '&bootdisk;' == 'sda' ] then BOOTPART=sda1 ROOTPART=sda2 fi
if [ '&bootdisk;' == 'mmcblk0' ] then BOOTPART=mmcblk0p1 ROOTPART=mmcblk0p2 fi
/usr/bin/dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/&bootdisk; bs=512 count=1024 /usr/sbin/parted -s /dev/&bootdisk; mklabel msdos
/usr/sbin/parted -s /dev/&bootdisk; "mkpart primary fat32 0% 100M" /usr/sbin/parted -s /dev/&bootdisk; "mkpart primary ext4 100M 100%"
/usr/sbin/mkfs -t vfat /dev/$BOOTPART /usr/sbin/mkfs -t ext4 /dev/$ROOTPART
mkdir -p /run/mnt/sysimage
/usr/bin/mount /dev/$ROOTPART /run/mnt/sysimage
(cd /run/mnt/sysimage ; mkdir boot ; /usr/bin/mount /dev/$BOOTPART boot)
mkdir -p /run/mnt/sysimage/etc/yum.repos.d
import stack.api
# # output "url" line first -- the url line will be a path to 'stacki' # listpallet = stack.api.Call('list pallet')
for o in listpallet: boxes = o['boxes'].split() if '&box;' in boxes: print '[%s-%s-%s]' % (o['name'], o['version'], o['release']) print 'name=%s %s %s' % (o['name'], o['version'], o['release']) print 'baseurl=http://%s/install/pallets/%s/%s/%s/%s/%s' % \ ('&Kickstart_PrivateAddress;', o['name'], o['version'], o['release'], o['os'], o['arch']) print 'assumeyes=1' print 'gpgcheck=0'
for o in stack.api.Call('list cart'): boxes = o['boxes'].split() if '&box;' in boxes: print '<stack:repo> --name="%s" --baseurl=http://127.0.0.1/install/carts/%s</stack:repo>' % (o['name'], o['name']) print '[cart-%s]' % (o['name']) print 'name=cart %s' % (o['name']) print 'baseurl=http://%s/install/carts/%s' % (o['name']) print 'assumeyes=1' print 'gpgcheck=0'
kickstart.package: @core pykickstart raspberrypi2-kernel raspberrypi2-firmware raspberrypi2-kernel-firmware ntp ntpdate foundation-python foundation-python-xml stacki-ace-install stacki-ace-profile stack-command stack-pylib
kickstart.post:
if [ '&bootdisk;' == 'sda' ] then BOOTPART=sda1 ROOTPART=sda2 fi
if [ '&bootdisk;' == 'mmcblk0' ] then BOOTPART=mmcblk0p1 ROOTPART=mmcblk0p2 fi
program_usb_boot_mode=1
/dev/$BOOTPART /boot vfat noatime 0 0 /dev/$ROOTPART / ext4 noatime 0 0
SELINUX=disabled
cp /opt/stack/systemd/stacki-install.service /usr/lib/systemd/system/ /usr/bin/systemctl enable stacki-install
/usr/bin/curl --insecure -o /dev/null \ https://&Kickstart_PrivateAddress;/install/sbin/public/setPxeboot.cgi?params='\{"action":"os"\}'
